alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:42PM EDT until May 09 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Greene County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 641 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Elm City, or 13 miles south of Rocky Mount, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Farmville, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Maury, Ormondsville, Lizzie, Fountain, Castoria and Walstonburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
